1806026616964426083.Text: A shipwreck? That's horrible! Oh, all of those wonderful pillows.... Well, I thank you, %PCName. It is good to know what became of my shipment, though the loss of pillows saddens me. A few of those were stuffed with racer plumes. A real shame. Still, thank you for your help with this. Take this as a token of my appreciation. It has served me well.
